item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

I’m using a server that currently has no magic damage boost; I want it to be percentage damage boost.
I’ve used this method in the past:

[code]public int magicHitBonus() {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15001) {
return 4;
} else {
return 0;
}
}

public int totalMagicBonus() {
    if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 15002) {
        return 1 + magicHitBonus();
    } else {
        return magicHitBonus();
    }
    }
}[/code]

But that gives a integer value boost.
I tried converting it, but I get a double-int error.
Any ideas?
